title: Ticket #2971: Add limits to stdout/stderr
description:
CMS has a use case where we have servers acting as schedulers submitting jobs on behalf of users. These servers can be quite busy, and it would be useful to be able to limit the size of the stdout/stderr coming back from the job. We don't want to limit DiskUsage for the job itself, since the actual output files get staged elsewhere, but it is possible for CMS users to accidentally generate multi-GB stdout and stderr.

Additionally, if we do hit a size limit, I think we'd like to tail rather than truncate, since that's marginally more likely to have useful information in it.
